title: Tourist bus smashes into New York apartment building injuring 9 - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Tourist bus smashes into New York apartment building injuring 9
A tour bus carrying tourists smashed into a building in Queens injuring nine people. The crash took place at the 63rd Avenue Woodhaven Boulevard in Rego Park, New York on Monday afternoon. Fire fighters managed to remove the bus by Monday night.
The tour bus belonging to Resorts World Cadino was travelling north on Woodhaven when it lost control and barged into the building. A large chunk of the building was damaged according to official statement. The building houses a law and realtor office and residential apartments.
The people in the apartment building were busy in their daily chores when suddenly they found a bus veering inside their houses. People were terribly upset and shaken.
Eye witnesses said that the driver was trying his best to avoid the accident. He wanted to turn right but failed to maintain his controls. The only way he could avoid a terrible accident was to swerve into the building. Those injured were rushed to the hospital. Witnesses also helped to recuse people before official help arrived.
The driver was badly injured suffering multiple injuries. Resorts World Casino New York City said in a statement that they would extend their full cooperation to the authorities in the investigation.
